candidates.title: Refactoring: okane-golden as a separate crate
candidates.body: It's reusable component.

candidates.title: Add tests about balance command, more errors.
candidates.body: Add more integration tests.

candidates.title: Refactoring: Restructured the test to use rstest in cli as well
candidates.body: As `core` tests already uses `rstest`, we can use the same machinery for `cli` tests.

candidates.title: Add tests to cover end-to-end behavior
candidates.body: Add more tests to cover some fundamental use cases.

candidates.title: Updated winnow to 0.7.0
candidates.body: No feature change

candidates.title: Fix: Upgrade deps, fixed warnings
candidates.body: Fixed all warnings related to winnow, as well as clippy warnings with the latest Rust.

candidates.title: Fix: include support glob pattern
candidates.body: This PR fixes #204, supports glob pattern like "**/*.ledger" in `include` directive.

candidates.title: Upgrade dependencies
candidates.body: That'll fix http://github.com/xkikeg/okane/security/dependabot/9.

candidates.title: Bump version to 0.14.0-dev
candidates.body: Bump version to 0.14.0-dev following 0.13.0 release.

candidates.title: Update dependencies
candidates.body: Upgrade quick_xml to 0.37, unicode_width to 0.2.

candidates.title: Add located error
candidates.body:
Report error when the program fails to compute the amount with the original file location.

This is an initial version on one particular type of error, it could be extended later.

Larger scope: #185

candidates.title: Add plain / tracked to syntax types
candidates.body:
Depending on the context, we may want to have a value with extra information `Tracked<T>`, or simple `T`.
Concretely, we want the original bytes position `Range<u64>`  on parser, while we don't have such an information on generating the value.
This could be allowed with GAT behaving like a higher kinded type.

candidates.title: Bump main branch version to 0.13.0-dev.
candidates.body: We released 0.12, so bump to 0.13.

candidates.title: Release: Release preparation for 0.12
candidates.body: Update dependencies and CHANGELOG.

candidates.title: Fix leak book keeping
candidates.body:
It used to leaked all `transaction.posting.amount`.

it'll be tricky to move `Amount` map into `Bump`, as mostly it's temporal and having it in arena can consume memory more than needed.

candidates.title: Bump version to 0.12.0-dev
candidates.body: Now v0.11 was released, so mainline should proceed to v0.12.0-dev.

candidates.title: Prepare release 0.11
candidates.body: release prep

candidates.title: Supported ISO Camt053 version 2019 Pty.
candidates.body: In ver 2019, it has <Pty> element within <Cdtr>/<Dbtr>/... This change supports both version.

candidates.title: Add template syntax in fields spec
candidates.body: Now we can have a generated value in CSV format.

candidates.title: Support account and commodity alias
candidates.body:
Ledger supports alias for both account and commodity and which is a critical feature.

Behavior difference from Ledger:

-   We explicitly prohibits having a alias which used to be a canonical. For example, below snippets are invalid:
    ```
    accounts Foo
      alias Bar
    accounts Baz
      alias Foo
    ```
-   We explicitly prohibits having a canonical which used to be a alias. Below are invalid:
    ```
    accounts Foo
      alias Bar
    accounts Bar
      alias Baz
    ```
- [derived from those 2] We prohibits having a self referencing alias. Below are invalid:
    ```
    accounts Foo
      alias Foo
    ```

This is to avoid complicated cyclic alias detection

candidates.title: Decimal improvements
candidates.body: Use `bytes` for parsing.

candidates.title: Updated dependencies, also CHANGELOG.
candidates.body: prep for version 0.10.0 release.

candidates.title: Documentation update
candidates.body: Update docs.

candidates.title: To static for test
candidates.body: With `bounded-static` crate power, we can derive cloned `LedgerEntry` which is easier to test with simple `assert_eq!`.

candidates.title: Add annotate-snippets support to pretty print errors.
candidates.body:
This makes the error much readable.
Curerntly line_number is wrong, so anonymized for now. Eventually it should be solved.

candidates.title: Use Stream bound instead of &str
candidates.body: Now it uses the fixed type `&str`, but it should be updated to `I: Stream` to support Located.

candidates.title: Renamed eval to report
candidates.body: Eventually eval module may be recreated purely for expression evaluation.

candidates.title: Add accounts command to list all accounts
candidates.body:
`accounts` command is one of the most primitive command to list all accounts without any transaction details.

This change includes `EvalContext` carrying all evaluation context (such as commodity, accounts)
and Arena-based allocation plus local String interner.

candidates.title: Add primitive flatten command with recursive loader
candidates.body: This implements the first milestone of #126 .

candidates.title: Release prep for v0.9.0
candidates.body: Added changelog, upgraded dependencies.

candidates.title: Replace nom with winnow
candidates.body:
That looks having better UX.

Solves #118 .

repo.name: okane
repo.description: Plain text accounting software supporting ledger-cli format using Rust
